entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as a family member who is looking at Harry suspiciously. She is described as having a firm grip.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is mentioned as having lost control and made something explode.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon are looking at Harry suspiciously.
Uncle Vernon is also looking at Harry suspiciously.
